channel.title: Need some 508 help

item.title: Need some 508 help
item.dc:creator: @zondrina zondrina
item.description:
@zondrina wrote:

[quote=“Davidi2, post:4, topic:402541”]I know, I looked at my old bubly just for you, change the last line to:

Thanks a bundle man, compiles like a charm finally.

That ends the ludicrous farce ive been having while trying to learn 508 stuff.

Anything I could do for you in repayment? Some rep?

item.title: Need some 508 help
item.dc:creator: @zondrina zondrina
item.description:
@zondrina wrote:

[quote=“Davidi2, post:2, topic:402541”]You don’t have a remove all items method in the Player class, you can either make one or just use:

for(int i = 0; i < p.items.length; i++) { p.items[i] = -1; p.itemsN[i] = 0; } p.frames.sendItems(p);

I’m pretty sure that’s how it works, but I haven’t looked at an unmodified Bulby in ages.[/quote]

Hmm I gave that a whirl and resulted with this :

else if (cmd[0].startsWith("empty")) { for(int i = 0; i < p.items.length; i++) { p.items[i] = -1; p.itemsN[i] = 0; } p.frames.sendItems(p); }

No dice.

EDIT : Also tried it without the p.frames.senditems removed. It compiled but nothing happened in game.

Read full topic

item.title: Need some 508 help
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

You don’t have a remove all items method in the Player class, you can either make one or just use:

for(int i = 0; i < p.items.length; i++) { p.items[i] = -1; p.itemsN[i] = 0; } p.frames.sendItems(p);

I’m pretty sure that’s how it works, but I haven’t looked at an unmodified Bulby in ages.

Read full topic

item.title: Need some 508 help
item.dc:creator: @zondrina zondrina
item.description:
@zondrina wrote:

else if (cmd[0].startsWith("empty")) { p.removeAllItems(); p.frames.sendMessage(p, "You just emptied your Inventory"); }

Im trying to get that to work in my commands.java, but everytime i compile i get this error :

Im aware of the PlayerAssistant needing to be modified or something, but it does not exist in the source im using.

Any help would be appreciated.

Read full topic
